pages.text: The Gods of higher worlds have long held many powers, including the power of casting $(thing)light$() upon the world. When combining godly materials in the fashion depicted on the following page, a staff can be created that shoots out a $(thing)ray of light$() which, when a block is hit, causes the surrounding area to be lit up as if $(item)Glowstone$() had been placed there.
Additionally, when the ray hits any sort of living creature, it will cause it to go up in $(thing)flames$(). $(p)To cast a ray of this kind, a small amount of $(aura) has to be carried on the user.
